amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the Office of Research and Special Programs of the DOT until the operator of the 16-inch oil pipeline running from Allen, WA to Renton, WA has completed hydrostatic testing of the entire pipeline at 125% maximum operational pressure and has reported on same to the Secretary.

action.text: Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the Inslee amendment (A008). The amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
